description.originalText: We have had the pleasure of having Esosa tutor our son, who is enrolled in a gifted and talented kindergarten program. Initially, he was struggling, feeling discouraged, and falling behind despite his bright nature. This is where Esosa's remarkable skills came into play.From the onset of her sessions, we noticed a significant and almost immediate improvement in our son's academic performance. Remarkably, within just two weeks of working with Esosa, he began reading confidently. More than just academic progress, Esosa has been instrumental in boosting his self-confidence, encouraging him to embrace and enjoy learning. Her approach is not merely about teaching; it's about instilling a love for learning and making it an enjoyable experience.Esosa's ability to motivate and connect with children is exceptional. She has a unique talent for engaging young minds in a way that is both educational and fun. This connection wasn't just limited to our son; as parents, we too found ourselves drawn to her teaching style. She provides us with weekly assessments, keeping us informed of our son's progress, and equips us with tools and strategies to support his learning journey at home.Her commitment and talent in working with children are evident in every session. While part of me wishes to keep such an incredible tutor our little secret, it's only fair that the world knows about Esosa's exceptional abilities with children.

description.displayText: Esosa looks after our toddler in a teacher capacity for two-hour educational play sessions. She has lesson plans and sends us feedback at the end of the week on our toddler's progress, which is exactly what we were looking for. Esosa is an absolute gem and we feel lucky that we've found her. Our toddler loves her so much that every morning she will wake up and ask if Esosa is coming. Could not recommend her more highly!

description.displayText: Esosa has been a godsend for us. It's hard to overstate the positive impact she had had in a short time with our family. We hired her to help us with virtual school for our two kids, one of whom has ADHD, dyslexia, and significant anxiety. Our kids love her. She is sensitive, thoughtful, fun, creative, communicative, playful-- everything you would look for in someone to take care of your children. She's been incredibly helpful with my older daughter, devising strategies to help her manage her anxiety, and take steps to overcome it. She's truly wonderful with kids, and I highly recommend her.

description.displayText: Esosa is an incredible sitter. She was such a godsend to find for our child who has special needs. She found innovative ways to help him during remote learning and he loves her upbeat, positive personality. She is as always trying fun, creative approaches to keep him occupied or to help him focus on schoolwork. She is very talented and we are so happy to know her.

description.displayText:
Esosa might be the ultimate-child whisperer. I have a hectic household of four children, and her presence has been a godsend! We've had a number of nannies who ranged from perfectly adequate to -- questionable. Two of my children have special-needs, so it was hard to find people who were equipped to handle them. And on the rare occasions we did find someone, they lacked the warmth and the ability to connect with my other children on the level they needed. None of that was an issue with Esosa.

She is fantastic with educational activities and have helped my children in much needed areas such as reading and writing. Her energy is infectious, and my children genuinely love her. I can't express how much she's helped my family. I see her being a part of our lives for a number of years. I can't recommend her enough!

description.displayText:
Esosa is incredibly talented in so many ways and has managed to keep my 3 children aged 9, 7 and 5 motivated during remote learning, laughing and playing between breaks and behaving kindly with each other.  She knows how to support my son with special needs (global development delay) who needs extra support and motivation to stay on task during his zoom calls and while she's doing that, she's helping my daughter get all her assignments done, makes lunch, squeezes in dance breaks and games wherever there's a free minute. 

Esosa brings so much joy and laughter to our house when shes's here - the kids wish she would never leave!  I can't endorse her enough, she has helped our family immensely.
